jobsJson.descriptionPlain: GoPlay is part of Gojek Entertainment Group which focuses on the Entertainment Industry. We are a product engineering team that is working to create the best entertainment experience for users on the Gojek platform. Our product and business are varying from Ticketing Platform, Live Event, Movie and Video-On-Demand services.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Build and deploy features iteratively in production
  • Work cross-functionally with product, engineering and design teams across Gojek
  • Collaborate with internal cross-functional teams (Backend, DevOps, Design, etc.) on planning and execution
  • Build delightful user-facing experiences with smooth performance
  • Provide feedback to colleagues

• 2+ years of experience in software development and 1+ years of hands-on experience in developing and testing apps on iOS for large scale applications
  • Deep understanding of the iOS frameworks like UIKit, Foundation, etc
  • Well versed with Agile methodologies, TDD and Automation
  • Ability to understand and implement continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery principles
  • Passion to learn new things, solve challenging problems
  • Eagerness to work openly and collaboratively with a diverse team
  • Attention to detail, particularly around software engineering fundamentals, testing methodologies, and quality
  • Have working experience with Live streaming or VOD system will be a plus
